sentences.sContent: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.sCn: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

sentences.sContent: ...The special features can add $25000 or more to the purchase price of a house...
...Studies since then suggest that marriage could add as much as seven years to a man’s life and two to a woman’s...
...Being sociable looks like a good way to add years to your life...
...and we must add approximately 6 billion private languages since each one of us necessarily has one...

synos.tran: 增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

phrases.pCn: 增加价值；附加价值；添加值
进一步证明；扩大影响；增强优势；加重

words.tran: 添加；[数] 加法；增加物
蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）

trans.tranOther: to put something with something else or with a group of other things
